name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer with a strong focus on machine learning and related technologies, I possess extensive experience in designing and implementing solutions specifically for speech synthesis and neural TTS. Over 8 years of proficiency in **Python** frameworks such as **PyTorch**, I excel in developing LLM-based approaches and multilingual modeling with a production mindset. My technical expertise includes utilizing **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Ray**, **Kubeflow**, **MLflow**, and **Weights & Biases** for efficient workflow management, analytics, and model deployment. I am adept at managing data streaming with **Kafka** and optimizing performance with **Redis** and databases like **PostgreSQL** and **Parquet**. Additionally, I have experience in microservices architecture and API development, enabling the delivery of high-performance systems tailored to business needs, while also showcasing strong team leadership skills.
